metaData.description: {"id": "climate_transition_scenarios", "title": "Bank of Canada: Climate Transition Scenario Data", "description": "Bank of Canada long-term projections (to 2050) under different climate policy scenarios used for climate risk analysis.", "column_descriptions": {"date": "Observation date", "baseline_2019_policies": "Baseline scenario assuming 2019 climate policies continue unchanged", "below_2c_immediate": "Below 2C scenario with immediate coordinated global policy action", "below_2c_delayed": "Below 2C scenario with delayed policy action requiring steeper cuts later", "net_zero_2050": "Net-zero by 2050 scenario (1.5C target) - most aggressive transition", "c4_scenario_1": "Climate scenario C4 variant 1 - alternative transition pathway", "c4_scenario_2": "Climate scenario C4 variant 2 - alternative transition pathway", "c4_scenario_3": "Climate scenario C4 variant 3 - alternative transition pathway", "c4_scenario_4": "Climate scenario C4 variant 4 - alternative transition pathway"}}
